file_insights.changes_summary: Added filter dropdown menu component with state management and UI controls
key_additions: Imported Menu, MenuItem from @mui/material for dropdown functionality
Imported FilterListIcon from @mui/icons-material for visual indicator
Imported GanttTaskType from types to support filter options
Imported useState hook for managing filter state
Added three state variables: filterAnchorEl, filterType, and filterMenuOpen
Implemented three handler functions: handleFilterClick, handleFilterClose, handleFilterSelect
Created filterOptions array with four filter choices: all, task, project, milestone
Added UI section with styled Button and Menu components in ToolbarBox

patterns_discovered.description: Used standard Material-UI Menu component with anchor element pattern for dropdown menus
Filter state controls both button label display and menu open/close state
filterOptions array defines menu structure, enabling easy addition/removal of filter types
Three complementary handlers (handleFilterClick, handleFilterClose, handleFilterSelect) work together

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Filter State Not Integrated with Task Filtering Logic
gotchas_discovered.description: filterType state is created and managed but never actually used to filter the libraryTasks array. The component renders all tasks regardless of the selected filter.
gotchas_discovered.impact: Feature is non-functional; users can select filters but they have no effect on displayed tasks
gotchas_discovered.resolution: Need to implement filtering logic using filterType to filter libraryTasks before rendering

gotchas_discovered.description: GanttTaskType was added to the import statement to support filter options, indicating dependency on existing type definitions
gotchas_discovered.impact: Minimal - correctly imported, but shows tight coupling to type definitions
gotchas_discovered.resolution: Keep type imports synchronized with feature usage

gotchas_discovered.description: Menu uses anchorOrigin and transformOrigin with 'right' horizontal alignment which may cause layout issues on small screens
gotchas_discovered.impact: Potential UI clipping on mobile devices
gotchas_discovered.resolution: Consider responsive adjustments or horizontal centering for mobile viewports

approach_outcome.completion: UI component successfully implemented with full state management
approach_outcome.functionality: Filter dropdown menu renders correctly with four filter options and proper MUI styling
approach_outcome.subtask_requirement: PARTIALLY MET - UI component added but filtering logic not implemented
approach_outcome.notes: Component is well-structured and follows Material-UI patterns correctly, but requires integration with actual task filtering logic to be fully functional

recommendations.recommendation: Implement task filtering logic using the filterType state to actually filter tasks before rendering in the Gantt chart
recommendations.implementation: Add filter operation on libraryTasks array based on filterType before passing to <Gantt /> component

recommendations.recommendation: Add unit tests for filter selection functionality and verify that filtering actually restricts displayed tasks
recommendations.implementation: Test each filter option produces correct task subset

recommendations.recommendation: Add visual feedback showing number of filtered tasks (e.g., 'Filter: Tasks Only (5 of 12)')
recommendations.implementation: Count filtered tasks and display count in button label

recommendations.recommendation: Test menu positioning on mobile devices and consider responsive positioning adjustments
recommendations.implementation: Add breakpoint-based menu positioning for smaller screens

recommendations.recommendation: Consider extracting filter options to a constant file for reusability across components
recommendations.implementation: Move filterOptions array to a separate constants file if used elsewhere
